item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: For more than thirty years, Southern Art has been creating small batches of artisan sauces to share with families and friends across the South. We are now excited to share our products with you and the people you love. Inspired by the art of Southern cooking and hospitality, we handcraft each bottle with high-quality ingredients, a bit of spice, and a lot of care. Enjoy!

item.title: News
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The Southern Art Company a Three-Time Winner at 2013 Chile Pepper Awards

1st Place Asian-Style Category: Korean BBQ Spicy 2nd Place Asian-Style Category: Korean BBQ Original 2nd Place Specialty Category: Southern Art Hot Sauce

For more info about the Chile Pepper Awards, visit the Chile Pepper Magazine website.

item.title: Southern Art Hot Sauce
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Southern Art Hot Sauce

    [add_to_cart id="291"]

    Our award-winning Hot Sauce is all-natural, gluten-free, and GMO-free. Since winning 2nd-place at the 2013 Chile Pepper Awards, our hot sauce has been enjoyed by many people as a dipping sauce, marinade, glaze, and more! Proudly made & bottled in the U.S.A.

item.title: Korean BBQ - Original
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Korean BBQ - Original

    $8.99

    The rich Asian flavors of sesame and soy sauce work in concert with the elements of a sweet southern barbecue sauce to create a synergistic work of art. Our award-winning Original Korean BBQ Sauce is all-natural. A 2nd-place winner at the 2013 Chile Pepper Awards in the Asian-Style Sauce category, our Original BBQ Sauce has been added to the grill-kits of many BBQ aficionados throughout the country! Proudly made & bottled in the U.S.A.

item.title: Korean BBQ - Spicy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
• Korean BBQ - Spicy

    $8.99

    Our pride and joy, the Spicy Korean BBQ Sauce won 1st Place at the 2013 Chile Pepper Festival and has been winning the hearts of spice-fans ever since. The rich Asian flavors of sesame and red pepper work in concert with the elements of a sweet and spicy southern barbecue sauce to give your BBQ creations extra flavor. Our Spicy Korean BBQ Sauce is all-natural. Proudly made & bottled in the U.S.A.

item.title: Privacy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We at Southern Art value your privacy. Email addresses, notes, and other content shared by visitors to this website or any affiliated page will not be provided or sold to any third party. All submitted content will become property of The Southern Art Company and may be used for marketing and research purposes. If you have questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact info@southernartco.com.

item.title: Shipping Info
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We ship all our products through FedEx Ground. This means your product will usually be delivered within the continental United States in 2 to 5 business days.​
